018package org.tquadrat.foundation.xml.builder.internal;
019
020import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.INTERNAL;
021import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.nonNull;
022import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNonNullArgument;
023import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNotEmptyArgument;
024import static org.tquadrat.foundation.xml.builder.XMLBuilderUtils.getElementNameValidator;
025import static org.tquadrat.foundation.xml.builder.XMLElement.Flags.ALLOWS_CHILDREN;
026import static org.tquadrat.foundation.xml.builder.XMLElement.Flags.ALLOWS_TEXT;
027import static org.tquadrat.foundation.xml.builder.XMLElement.Flags.VALIDATES_ATTRIBUTES;
028import static org.tquadrat.foundation.xml.builder.XMLElement.Flags.VALIDATES_CHILDREN;
029
030import java.net.URI;
031import java.net.URISyntaxException;
032import java.util.Collection;
033import java.util.Comparator;
034import java.util.EnumSet;
035import java.util.Map;
036import java.util.Optional;
037import java.util.Set;
038
039import org.apiguardian.api.API;
040import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
041import org.tquadrat.foundation.xml.builder.Namespace;
042import org.tquadrat.foundation.xml.builder.XMLBuilderUtils;
043import org.tquadrat.foundation.xml.builder.XMLElement;
044import org.tquadrat.foundation.xml.builder.spi.AttributeSupport;
045import org.tquadrat.foundation.xml.builder.spi.ChildSupport;
046import org.tquadrat.foundation.xml.builder.spi.Element;
047import org.tquadrat.foundation.xml.builder.spi.InvalidXMLNameException;
048
049/**
050 *  An implementation of
051 *  {@link XMLElement}
052 *  that supports attributes, namespaces, children, text, {@code CDATA} and
053 *  comments.
054 *
055 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
056 *  @version $Id: XMLElementImpl.java 1030 2022-04-06 13:42:02Z tquadrat $
057 *  @since 0.0.5
058 *
059 *  @UMLGraph.link
060 */
061@SuppressWarnings( "removal" )
062@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: XMLElementImpl.java 1030 2022-04-06 13:42:02Z tquadrat $" )
063@API( status = INTERNAL, since = "0.0.5" )
064public sealed class XMLElementImpl implements XMLElement
065    permits org.tquadrat.foundation.xml.builder.spi.XMLElementAdapter, org.tquadrat.foundation.xml.builder.spi.XMLElementBase
066    /*
067     * org.tquadrat.foundation.xml.builder.spi.XMLElementBase is deprecated now
068     * and will be removed from the permits list once the class will be
069     * removed.
070     *
071     * org.tquadrat.foundation.xml.builder.spi.XMLElementAdapter is the
072     * replacement with the same functionality.
073     */
074{
075        /*------------*\
076    ====** Attributes **=======================================================
077        \*------------*/
078    /**
079     *  The attribute support.
080     */
081    @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
082    private final AttributeSupport m_Attributes;
083
084    /**
085     *  The child support.
086     */
087    @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
088    private final ChildSupport m_Children;
089
090    /**
091     *  The element name.
092     */
093    private final String m_ElementName;
094
095    /**
096     *  The parent element.
097     */
098    private Element m_Parent;
099
100        /*--------------*\
101    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
102        \*--------------*/
103    /**
104     *  <p>{@summary Creates a new {@code XMLElementImpl} instance.}</p>
105     *  <p>The given element name is validated using the method that is
106     *  provided by
107     *  {@link XMLBuilderUtils#getElementNameValidator()}.</p>
108     *  <p>The new element allows attributes and children, but will not
109     *  validate them. It also allows text.</p>
110     *
111     *  @note   This constructor is mainly used by the factory methods in
112     *      {@link XMLBuilderUtils}
113     *      for on-the-fly XML generation.
114     *
115     *  @param  elementName The element name.
116     */
117    @SuppressWarnings( "ThisEscapedInObjectConstruction" )
118    public XMLElementImpl( final String elementName )
119    {
120        m_ElementName = requireNotEmptyArgument( elementName, "elementName" );
121        if( !getElementNameValidator().test( elementName ) ) throw new InvalidXMLNameException( elementName );
122
123        m_Attributes = new AttributeSupport( this, false );
124        m_Children = new ChildSupport( this, false, true, true, XMLBuilderUtils::escapeXML );
125    }   //  XMLElementImpl()
126
127    /**
128     *  <p>{@summary Creates a new {@code XMLElementImpl} instance.}</p>
129     *  <p>The given element name is validated using the method that is
130     *  provided by
131     *  {@link XMLBuilderUtils#getElementNameValidator()}.</p>
132     *
133     *  @note   This constructor is used for the implementation of XML
134     *      specialisations, like SVG or HTML (although this not really XML).
135     *      It is made accessible through
136     *      {@link org.tquadrat.foundation.xml.builder.spi.XMLElementBase}
137     *
138     *  @param  elementName The element name.
139     *  @param  flags   The configuration flags for the new element.
140     *
141     *  @see org.tquadrat.foundation.xml.builder.XMLElement.Flags
142     *  @see AttributeSupport#registerAttributes(String...)
143     *  @see AttributeSupport#registerSequence(String...)
144     *  @see ChildSupport#registerChildren(String...)
145     */
146    @SuppressWarnings( "ThisEscapedInObjectConstruction" )
147    protected XMLElementImpl( final String elementName, final Set<Flags> flags )
148    {
149        m_ElementName = requireNotEmptyArgument( elementName, "elementName" );
150        if( !getElementNameValidator().test( elementName ) ) throw new InvalidXMLNameException( elementName );
151
152        final var checkAttributes = requireNonNullArgument( flags, "flags" ).contains( VALIDATES_ATTRIBUTES );
153        final var checkChildren = flags.contains( VALIDATES_CHILDREN );
154        final var allowChildren = checkChildren || flags.contains( ALLOWS_CHILDREN );
155        final var allowText = flags.contains( ALLOWS_TEXT );
156
157        m_Attributes = new AttributeSupport( this, checkAttributes );
158        m_Children = new ChildSupport( this, checkChildren, allowChildren, allowText, XMLBuilderUtils::escapeXML );
159    }   //  XMLElementImpl()
160
161    /**
162     *  <p>{@summary Creates a new {@code XMLElementImpl} instance.}</p>
163     *  <p>The given element name is validated using the method that is
164     *  provided by
165     *  {@link XMLBuilderUtils#getElementNameValidator()}.</p>
166     *
167     *  @param  elementName The element name.
168     *  @param  validChildren   The list of the names for valid children; if
169     *      {@code null}, no children are allowed, if empty, children are
170     *      allowed, but they will not be validated.
171     *  @param  validAttributes The list of the valid attributes; if empty or
172     *      {@code null}, the attributes will not be validated.
173     *  @param  attributeSequence   The sequence for the attributes; if empty
174     *      or {@code null}, the attributes will be sorted alphabetically.
175     *  @param  allowText   {@code true} if the element allows text,
176     *      {@code false} if not.
177     *
178     *  @see AttributeSupport#registerAttributes(String...)
179     *  @see AttributeSupport#registerSequence(String...)
180     *  @see ChildSupport#registerChildren(String...)
181     *
182     *  @deprecated Use
183     *      {@link #XMLElementImpl(String, Set)}
184     *      instead.
185     */
186    @SuppressWarnings( "ThisEscapedInObjectConstruction" )
187    @Deprecated( forRemoval = true )
188    public XMLElementImpl( final String elementName, final String [] validChildren, final String [] validAttributes, final String [] attributeSequence, final boolean allowText )
189    {
190        m_ElementName = requireNotEmptyArgument( elementName, "elementName" );
191        if( !getElementNameValidator().test( elementName ) ) throw new InvalidXMLNameException( elementName );
192
193        final var checkAttributes = nonNull( validAttributes ) && (validAttributes.length > 0);
194        final var allowChildren = nonNull( validChildren );
195        final var checkChildren = allowChildren && (validChildren.length > 0);
196
197        m_Attributes = new AttributeSupport( this, checkAttributes );
198        m_Children = new ChildSupport( this, checkChildren, allowChildren, allowText, XMLBuilderUtils::escapeXML );
199
200        if( checkAttributes ) registerValidAttributes( validAttributes );
201        if( nonNull( attributeSequence ) && (attributeSequence.length > 0) ) registerAttributeSequence( attributeSequence );
202        if( checkChildren ) m_Children.registerChildren( validChildren );
203    }   //  XMLElementImpl()
204
205        /*---------*\
206    ====** Methods **==========================================================
207        \*---------*/
208    /**
209     *  {@inheritDoc}
210     */
211    @Override
212    public final XMLElement addCDATA( final CharSequence text ) throws IllegalArgumentException
213    {
214        m_Children.addCDATA( text );
215
216        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
217        return this;
218    }   //  addCDATA()
219
220    /**
221     *  {@inheritDoc}
222     */
223    @Override
224    public final <E extends XMLElement> XMLElement addChild( final E child ) throws IllegalArgumentException, IllegalStateException
225    {
226        m_Children.addChild( child );
227
228        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
229        return this;
230    }   //  addChild()
231
232    /**
233     *  {@inheritDoc}
234     */
235    @Override
236    public final XMLElement addComment( final CharSequence comment ) throws IllegalArgumentException
237    {
238        m_Children.addComment( comment );
239
240        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
241        return this;
242    }   //  addComment()
243
244    /**
245     *  {@inheritDoc}
246     */
247    @Override
248    public final XMLElement addPredefinedMarkup( final CharSequence markup ) throws IllegalArgumentException
249    {
250        m_Children.addPredefinedMarkup( markup );
251
252        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
253        return this;
254    }   //  addPredefinedMarkup()
255
256    /**
257     *  {@inheritDoc}
258     */
259    @Override
260    public final XMLElement addText( final CharSequence text ) throws IllegalArgumentException
261    {
262        m_Children.addText( text );
263
264        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
265        return this;
266    }   //  addText()
267
268    /**
269     *  {@inheritDoc}
270     */
271    @Override
272    public final Optional<String> getAttribute( final String name ) { return m_Attributes.getAttribute( name ); }
273
274    /**
275     *  {@inheritDoc}
276     */
277    @Override
278    public Map<String,String> getAttributes() { return m_Attributes.getAttributes(); }
279
280    /**
281     *  {@inheritDoc}
282     */
283    @Override
284    public Collection<? extends Element> getChildren()
285    {
286        final var retValue = m_Children.getChildren();
287
288        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
289        return retValue;
290    }   //  getChildren()
291
292    /**
293     *  {@inheritDoc}
294     */
295    @Override
296    public final String getElementName() { return m_ElementName; }
297
298    /**
299     *  {@inheritDoc}
300     */
301    @Override
302    public final Set<Flags> getFlags()
303    {
304        final var retValue = EnumSet.noneOf( Flags.class );
305        if( nonNull( m_Children ) )
306        {
307            if( m_Children.allowsChildren() ) retValue.add( ALLOWS_CHILDREN );
308            if( m_Children.allowsText() ) retValue.add( ALLOWS_TEXT );
309            if( m_Children.checksIfValid() ) retValue.add( VALIDATES_CHILDREN );
310        }
311
312        if( m_Attributes.checksIfValid() ) retValue.add( VALIDATES_ATTRIBUTES );
313
314        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
315        return retValue;
316    }   //  getFlags()
317
318    /**
319     *  {@inheritDoc}
320     */
321    @Override
322    public final Collection<Namespace> getNamespaces() { return m_Attributes.getNamespaces(); }
323
324    /**
325     *  {@inheritDoc}
326     */
327    @Override
328    public final Optional<Element> getParent() { return Optional.ofNullable( m_Parent ); }
329
330    /**
331     *  Returns the attribute sort order.
332     *
333     *  @return The comparator that determines the attribute's sequence.
334     */
335    @SuppressWarnings( "PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface" )
336    public final Comparator<String> getSortOrder() { return m_Attributes.getSortOrder(); }
337
338    /**
339     *  {@inheritDoc}
340     */
341    @Override
342    public boolean hasChildren() { return m_Children.hasChildren(); }
343
344    /**
345     *  <p>{@summary Registers an attribute sequence for this element}; this
346     *  modifies any sort order that was previously set.</p>
347     *  <p>The names for the attributes are not validated; in particular, it
348     *  is not checked whether an attribute is listed as valid.</p>
349     *
350     *  @param  attributes  The names of the attributes in the desired
351     *      sequence.
352     */
353    @SuppressWarnings( "PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface" )
354    public final void registerAttributeSequence( final String... attributes )
355    {
356        m_Attributes.registerSequence( attributes );
357    }   //  registerAttributeSequence()
358
359    /**
360     *  Registers an attribute sequence for this element; this modifies any
361     *  sort order that was previously set.
362     *
363     *  @param  sortOrder  The sort order for the attributes.
364     */
365    @SuppressWarnings( "PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface" )
366    public final void registerAttributeSequence( final Comparator<String> sortOrder )
367    {
368        m_Attributes.setSortOrder( sortOrder );
369    }   //  registerAttributeSequence()
370
371    /**
372     *  Registers the valid attributes for this element.<br>
373     *  <br>Nothing happens if
374     *  {@link AttributeSupport#checksIfValid()}
375     *  returns {@code false}, although a call to this method is obsolete then.
376     *
377     *  @note   The given attributes will be <i>added</i> to the already
378     *      existing ones!
379     *
380     *  @param  attributes  The names of the valid attributes.
381     *  @throws InvalidXMLNameException One of the attribute names is invalid.
382     */
383    @SuppressWarnings( "PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface" )
384    public final void registerValidAttributes( final String... attributes )
385    {
386        m_Attributes.registerAttributes( attributes );
387    }   //  registerValidAttributes()
388
389    /**
390     *  Registers the element names of valid child elements for this element.
391     *
392     *  @note   The given children will be <i>added</i> to the already existing
393     *      ones!
394     *
395     *  @param  children    The element names of the valid children.
396     */
397    @SuppressWarnings( "PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface" )
398    public final void registerValidChildren( final String... children )
399    {
400        if( nonNull( m_Children ) ) m_Children.registerChildren( children );
401    }   //  registerValidChildren()
402
403    /**
404     *  Returns the list of the registered attributes.
405     *
406     *  @return The registered attributes.
407     */
408    @SuppressWarnings( "PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface" )
409    public final Collection<String> retrieveValidAttributes() { return m_Attributes.retrieveValidAttributes(); }
410
411    /**
412     *  Returns the list of the registered children.
413     *
414     *  @return The registered children.
415     */
416    @SuppressWarnings( "PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface" )
417    public final Collection<String> retrieveValidChildren() { return m_Children.retrieveValidChildren(); }
418
419    /**
420     *  {@inheritDoc}
421     *  <p>The given attribute name is validated using the method that is
422     *  provided by
423     *  {@link XMLBuilderUtils#getAttributeNameValidator()}.</p>
424     */
425    @Override
426    public final XMLElement setAttribute( final String name, final CharSequence value, final Optional<? extends CharSequence> append ) throws IllegalArgumentException
427    {
428        m_Attributes.setAttribute( name, value, append );
429
430        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
431        return this;
432    }   //  setAttribute()
433
434    /**
435     *  {@inheritDoc}
436     */
437    @Override
438    public final XMLElement setNamespace( final String identifier ) throws IllegalArgumentException, URISyntaxException
439    {
440        m_Attributes.setNamespace( identifier );
441
442        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
443        return this;
444    }   //  setNamespace()
445
446    /**
447     *  {@inheritDoc}
448     */
449    @Override
450    public final XMLElement setNamespace( final URI identifier ) throws IllegalArgumentException
451    {
452        m_Attributes.setNamespace( identifier );
453
454        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
455        return this;
456    }   //  setNamespace()
457
458    /**
459     *  {@inheritDoc}
460     *  <p>The given prefix is validated using the method that is
461     *  provided by
462     *  {@link XMLBuilderUtils#getPrefixValidator()}.</p>
463     */
464    @Override
465    public final XMLElement setNamespace( final String prefix, final String identifier ) throws IllegalArgumentException, URISyntaxException
466    {
467        m_Attributes.setNamespace( prefix, identifier );
468
469        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
470        return this;
471    }   //  setNamespace()
472
473    /**
474     *  {@inheritDoc}
475     *  <p>The given prefix is validated using the method that is
476     *  provided by
477     *  {@link XMLBuilderUtils#getPrefixValidator()}.</p>
478     */
479    @Override
480    public final XMLElement setNamespace( final String prefix, final URI identifier ) throws IllegalArgumentException
481    {
482        m_Attributes.setNamespace( prefix, identifier );
483
484        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
485        return this;
486    }   //  setNamespace()
487
488    /**
489     *  {@inheritDoc}
490     */
491    @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
492    @Override
493    public final XMLElement setNamespace( final Namespace namespace ) throws IllegalArgumentException
494    {
495        m_Attributes.setNamespace( namespace );
496
497        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
498        return this;
499    }   //  setNamespace()
500
501    /**
502     *  {@inheritDoc}
503     */
504    @Override
505    public final <E extends Element> void setParent( final E parent )
506    {
507        m_Parent = requireNonNullArgument( parent, "parent" );
508    }   //  setParent()
509
510    /**
511     *  {@inheritDoc}
512     */
513    @Override
514    public String toString() { return toString( 0, true ); }
515}
516//  class XMLElementImpl
